attributes.action: Re-open RAF Framlington for civil flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
RAF Framlingham (also known as Parham) is a former World War II airfield in England. The field is located 3 miles SE of Framlingham in Suffolk.

I would like to see this re-opened as a civil airfiled. It would be popular with aviation enthusiasts and would be a boost to the local area
